content: Write a story about Jack and Phil encountering another young man with sneezes like Jack’s. Begin with Jack and Phil hearing an enormous sneeze in the distance. Phil looks over at Jack, thinking it was Jack that sneezed. Just as they realize it wasn’t Jack sneezing, they hear another colossal sneeze. They head in the direction of the sneezes. End with Jack and Phil arriving on the scene as the young man unleashes another monster sneeze. Write in the style of Neil Gaiman.
